titles.title: To extend the National Flood Insurance Program until December 7, 2018.
National Flood Insurance Program Further Extension Act of 2018
National Flood Insurance Program Further Extension Act of 2018
National Flood Insurance Program Further Extension Act of 2018
National Flood Insurance Program Further Extension Act of 2018
National Flood Insurance Program Further Extension Act of 2018
National Flood Insurance Program Further Extension Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Mr. Hensarling moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 7187.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 350 - 46 (Roll no. 424).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
National Flood Insurance Program Further Extension Act of 2018
(Sec. 2) This bill amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program through December 7, 2018.
